textos_fuente.text: Welcome to Mayami Wynwood: Mexican Fusion Restaurant in Miami top of page RESERVATIONS MENU EVENTS WEEKLY LINEUP PRIVATE EVENTS ORDER ONLINE More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. WELCOME TO MAYAMI WYNWOOD THE ONLY MEXICAN-FUSION MIAMI RESTAURANT WITH NIGHTCLUB VIBES RESERVE MY TABLE EAT The kind of dishes that make the table next to you jealous. If you're looking for where to eat in Miami, this is it. From hot stones to sushi that slaps, dinner in Miami hits different here. EXPLORE OUR MENUS DRINK Unlike most Wynwood bars, every sip and pour is bold, balanced, and built to leave a mark. These handcrafted cocktails don’t just look good. They taste like your next bad decision. SEE OUR COCKTAILS PARTY Dinner turns into a dance floor with a variety of entertainment like live DJs, fire shows, bottle service, and birthday energy every night of the week. The best dinner party in Miami starts here. BOOK YOUR EXPERIENCE DINNER MEETS DANCEFLOOR From date night to any night, your night out in Wynwood starts and ends at Mayami Wynwood, of the most unforgettable places to eat in Miami. Dinner turns into a show, shows turn into a party, and your night turns all the way up. More flavor, more fire, and more energy than most Miami clubs can handle. DINE AND DANCE WITH US VOTED BEST LADIES NIGHT IN MIAMI Turn up the heat with dinner, dancing, and a free bottle for groups of 5+ ladies before 12AM for the Miami nightlife experience your group chat’s been waiting for. It’s the kind of energy you won’t find at typical Miami dance clubs. RESERVE NOW Thursdays Only DINNER SHOWS IN MIAMI ALL WEEK LONG As one of the hottest restaurants in Miami, Mayami Wynwood brings more than flavor. Among all the fun restaurants with entertainment, only one brings this much heat to the table. From fire dancers to live singers and go-go sets that light up the room, Mayami Wynwood delivers one of the most unforgettable dinner shows in Miami. If you're searching for clubs in Miami with a twist, you just found it. Welcome to the dinner and show Miami locals and tourists can’t stop talking about. SEE THIS WEEK'S EVENTS *Entertainment and performances vary by night and are subject to change. HOST YOUR PARTY AT A TOP MIAMI RESTAURANT Looking for a spot that brings the iconic Miami food and the fire? Whether it’s your corporate work team, your birthday party crew, or your bride bachelorette tribe, we’re one of the best restaurants in Miami that knows how to party right. As one of the trendiest restaurants in Miami, we blend bold bites with unforgettable energy. If you're planning a private event, do it at one of the top Wynwood restaurants with a nightlife twist for a vibe you can't find at any other Wynwood club in Miami. HOST YOUR EVENT WITH US NOT YOUR AVERAGE MIAMI RESTAURANT Located in the heart of Wynwood Miami, Mayami is a Tulum-inspired restaurant and nightlife destination brought to life by hospitality visionary Philippe Kalifa. Since opening in November 2020, this iconic Wynwood restaurant has earned a reputation for hosting the most immersive dinner parties in Miami, blending Latin-Mediterranean cuisine with hot live entertainment. ​ ​ 7 nights of immersive dinner party themes with live music and entertainment Latin-Mediterranean fusion served in a massive, open-air jungle courtyard Bottle parades, high-energy ambiance, and a full nightlife vibe all during your Miami dinner ​ ​ As one of the best restaurants in Wynwood, we do more than serve dinner. We serve a full-blown experience. Mayami Wynwood blurs the line between Miami restaurant with a Miami nightclub atmosphere with fire dancers, go-go performers, live music, and Tulum-inspired decor that’s unmatched among Wynwood restaurants with entertainment. You don’t just eat here. You feel it. For people who want to dine in Miami with a little attitude and maybe end up dancing on the way out, Mayami is it. BOOK YOUR TABLE Wynwood restaurants Clubs in miami Wynwood restaurants 1/2 THE EXPERIENCE EVERYONE IS TALKING ABOUT We’re not just one of the best Miami restaurants, we’re the ONLY one that transforms into a party while you're still at the table and that’s exactly what sets our unique dining experience apart from other restaurants Miami has to offer. Local Guide: Brandon Cuenca on Google "Doesn’t matter if it’s a happy hour date or dinner with a group of friends, Mayami does not disappoint. The seafood is fresh, service at the bar is top tier, and ambiance is upbeat and fun. This place is worth visiting." DRESS CODE STRICT DRESS CODE ENFORCED: "BUSINESS CASUAL" ​Mayami, recognized as one of the best restaurants in Wynwood, promotes an upscale dining atmosphere. We kindly ask our guests to abide by these suggestions to create an enjoyable environment for all. ​ The following items are prohibited however: • Gentlemen’s tank tops or sleeveless shirts • Hats are not permitted for gentlemen • No exposed undergarments or beach attire • Footwear is required, no flip flops, no sandals • No athletic or sports uniforms • Gentleman's sports shorts • Sweat Pants / Cargo Pants​ • No sweatshirts or Hoodies ***Dress code is always up to the discretion of management *** From Plate to Party – Sign Up to Our VIP Email List Email I agree to receive marketing communications, updates, and special offers from Mayami Wynwood. I understand that I can unsubscribe at any time. Sign Me Up! Thanks for subscribing! ID POLICY: In compliance with Florida state law, we only accept the following valid forms of identification to verify legal drinking age: a foreign passport, United States passport, or United States driver’s license. All IDs must be current and physically presented. Digital or photographic copies are not permitted. (786) 660-1341 info@mayamiwynwood.com MAIN ENTRANCE: 127 NW 23rd St. Miami, FL 33127 SECOND ENTRANCE: 130 NW 24th St. Miami, FL 33127, USA MAYAMI WYNWOOD HOURS Monday - Friday: 5:00PM to 3:00AM Saturday - Sunday: 12:00PM to 3:00AM HAPPY HOUR Monday - Friday: 5:00PM to 7:00PM Sunday: 6:00PM to 8:00PM BRUNCH HOUR Saturday - Sunday: 12:00PM to 6:00PM MUST BE 21 AND OVER AFTER 11PM EXPLORE Reservations Online Menu Weekly Lineup Private Events Order Online Contact Us RESOURCES Blog FAQ Gallery Hiring Press LOCATED IN THE ❤️ OF WYNWOOD MIAMI FL DESIGNED BY UADV Mayami Wynwood © 2025 bottom of page

HOST YOUR NEXT PRIVATE PARTY AT MAYAMI WYNWOOD Looking for Private Event Restaurants in Miami? You've Come to the Right Place. ​ Whether you're planning a corporate celebration, birthday dinner, or private party in Miami, Mayami Wynwood offers unforgettable energy in one of the top Wynwood event venues. With multiple private dining spaces and customized experiences for groups of 15 or more, your event becomes more than a gathering...it becomes a moment. We’re not just another private events restaurant in Miami, we’re the vibe everyone will remember. ​ Fill out the form below and one of our team members will be in contact with you within 24 hours. EXPLORE OUR UNIQUE MAYAMI WYNWOOD EVENT SPACES Our venue is designed with flexibility and flair, offering a range of Wynwood event spaces to match your vision. Whether you're after a laid-back patio party, an indoor dinner with impact, or a high-end VIP experience, we’ve got the square footage and style to pull it off. From elegant private dining restaurants in Miami to lively places for parties in Miami, Mayami combines location, service, and energy...all in one iconic destination. INSIDE A refined indoor setting, perfect for formal dinners, presentations, or corporate events. ​ COCKTAIL STYLE: 150 PEOPLE SEATED DINNER: 38 PEOPLE SQFT: 1,3867 PATIO TREE A private and premium space, suited for elevated group experiences or exclusive events.​ ​ COCKTAIL STYLE: 40 PEOPLE SEATED DINNER: 35 PEOPLE SQFT: 560 PATIO An open-air space surrounded by greenery, ideal for outdoor receptions or social gatherings. (NOT Private) ​ COCKTAIL STYLE: 70 PEOPLE SEATED DINNER: 50 PEOPLE SQFT: 850 UPPER VIP AREA 1 An intimate setting for smaller groups or executive dinners. ​ COCKTAIL STYLE: UP TO 40 SEATED DINNER: 50 PEOPLE SQFT: 416 Anchor 1 READY TO BOOK ONE OF THE BEST PRIVATE DINING SPOTS IN MIAMI? Mayami is one of the most in-demand private dining Miami FL locations — and your date won’t hold itself. Tell us what you’re celebrating and let us take care of the rest. Whether you're browsing Wynwood venues or hunting for the perfect private party Miami experience, we’re here to deliver something unforgettable. FILL OUT FORM MAYAMI ID POLICY In Accordance With Laws of the State of Florida. We can Only Accepts The Following Forms Of Indentification To Prove That you Are of Legal Drinking Age To Consume Any Alcoholic Beverage in Our Restaurant. 1. Foreign Passport 2. United States Passport 3. United States Drivers License. These Forms Of Id Must Be Current And In The Possession Of Said Person. No Digital Or Photographic Copies Are Acceptable. MUST BE 21 AND OVER AFTER 9PM (786) 660-1341 info@mayamiwynwood.com MAIN ENTRANCE: 127 NW 23rd St. Miami, FL 33127 SECOND ENTRANCE: 130 NW 24th St. Miami, FL 33127, USA MAYAMI WYNWOOD HOURS Monday - Friday: 5:00PM to 3:00AM Saturday - Sunday: 12:00PM to 3:00AM HAPPY HOUR Monday - Friday: 5:00PM to 7:00PM Sunday: 6:00PM to 8:00PM BRUNCH HOUR Saturday - Sunday: 12:00PM to 6:00PM MUST BE 21 AND OVER AFTER 11PM EXPLORE Reservations Online Menu Weekly Lineup Private Events Order Online Contact Us RESOURCES Blog FAQ Gallery Hiring Press LOCATED IN THE ❤️ OF WYNWOOD MIAMI FL DESIGNED BY UADV Mayami Wynwood © 2025 bottom of page

Privacy Policy | Mayami Wynwood top of page RESERVATIONS MENU EVENTS WEEKLY LINEUP PRIVATE EVENTS ORDER ONLINE More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. Privacy Policy Last updated: July 10, 2024 ​ This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use, and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and informs You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. ​ We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. ​ Interpretation and Definitions Interpretation The words with the initial letter capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. These definitions have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or plural. ​ Definitions Account: A unique account created for you to access our Service or parts of our Service. Affiliate: An entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest, or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority. Company (referred to as "the Company", "We", "Us", or "Our" in this Agreement): Refers to Wynwood Creation LLC, 1000 Biscayne Blvd Unit 2201 Miami, FL 33132. Cookies: Small files placed on your computer, mobile device, or any other device by a website, containing the details of your browsing history on that website among its many uses. Country: Refers to Florida, United States. Device: Any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone, or a digital tablet. Personal Data: Any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual. Service: Refers to the Website. Service Provider: Any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. Third-party Social Media Service: Any website or any social network website through which a User can log in or create an account to use the Service. Usage Data: Data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit). Website: Refers to Mayami Wynwood, accessible from https://www.mayamiwynwood.com/ You: The individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable. ​ Collecting and Using Your Personal Data Types of Data Collected Personal Data While using Our Service, We may ask you to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to: Email address First name and last name Phone number Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City Usage Data ​ Usage Data Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service. Usage Data may include information such as your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g., IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data. ​ When you access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device you use, your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data. ​ We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service or when you access the Service by or through a mobile device. ​ Information from Third-Party Social Media Services The Company allows you to create an account and log in to use the Service through the following Third-party Social Media Services: Google Facebook Instagram Twitter LinkedIn ​ If you decide to register through or otherwise grant us access to a Third-Party Social Media Service, We may collect Personal data that is already associated with your Third-Party Social Media Service's account, such as your name, your email address, your activities, or your contact list associated with that account. ​ You may also have the option of sharing additional information with the Company through your Third-Party Social Media Service's account. If you choose to provide such information and Personal Data, during registration or otherwise, you are giving the Company permission to use, share, and store it in a manner consistent with this Privacy Policy. ​ Tracking Technologies and Cookies We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on Our Service and store certain information. Tracking technologies used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze Our Service. The technologies We use may include: Cookies or Browser Cookies: A cookie is a small file placed on your Device. You can instruct your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when a Cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept Cookies, you may not be able to use some parts of our Service. Unless you have adjusted your browser setting so that it will refuse Cookies, our Service may use Cookies. Web Beacons: Certain sections of our Service and our emails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of a certain section and verifying system and server integrity). ​ Cookies can be "Persistent" or "Session" Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on your personal computer or mobile device when you go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as you close your web browser. Learn more about cookies on the Free Privacy Policy website article. We use both Session and Persistent Cookies for the purposes set out below: Necessary / Essential Cookies Type: Session Cookies Administered by: Us Purpose: These Cookies are essential to provide you with services available through the Website and to enable you to use some of its features. They help to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these Cookies, the services that you have asked for cannot be provided, and We only use these Cookies to provide you with those services. Cookies Policy / Notice Acceptance Cookies Type: Persistent Cookies Administered by: Us Purpose: These Cookies identify if users have accepted the use of cookies on the Website. Functionality Cookies Type: Persistent Cookies Administered by: Us Purpose: These Cookies allow us to remember choices you make when you use the Website, such as remembering your login details or language preference. The purpose of these Cookies is to provide you with a more personal experience and to avoid you having to re-enter your preferences every time you use the Website. ​ For more information about the cookies we use and your choices regarding cookies, please visit our Cookies Policy or the Cookies section of our Privacy Policy. ​ Use of Your Personal Data The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes: To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service. To manage Your Account: to manage your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data you provide can give you access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to you as a registered user. For the performance of a contract: the development, compliance, and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items, or services you have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service. To contact you: To contact you by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products, or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation. To provide you with news, special offers, and general information about other goods, services, and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless you have opted not to receive such information. To manage your requests: To attend and manage your requests to Us. For business transfers: We may use your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Data held by Us about our Service users is among the assets transferred. For other purposes: We may use your information for other purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns and to evaluate and improve our Service, products, services, marketing, and your experience. ​ We may share your personal information in the following situations: With Service Providers: We may share your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to contact you. For business transfers: We may share or transfer your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company. With Affiliates: We may share your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners, or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us. With business partners: We may share your information with Our business partners to offer you certain products, services, or promotions. With other users: When you share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside. If you interact with other users or register through a Third-Party Social Media Service, your contacts on the Third-Party Social Media Service may see your name, profile, pictures, and description of your activity. Similarly, other users will be able to view descriptions of your activity, communicate with you, and view your profile. With your consent: We may disclose your personal information for any other purpose with your consent. ​ Retention of Your Personal Data The Company will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies. ​ The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of Our Service, or We are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods. ​ Transfer of Your Personal Data Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction. Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by your submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer. ​ The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of your data and other personal information. ​ Delete Your Personal Data You have the right to delete or request that We assist in deleting the Personal Data that We have collected about you. ​ Our Service may give you the ability to delete certain information about you from within the Service. You may update, amend, or delete your information at any time by signing in to your Account, if you have one, and visiting the account settings section that allows you to manage your personal information. You may also contact Us to request access to, correct, or delete any personal information that you have provided to Us. ​ Please note, however, that We may need to retain certain information when we have a legal obligation or lawful basis to do so. ​ Disclosure of Your Personal Data Business Transactions If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your Personal Data may be transferred. We will provide notice before your Personal Data is transferred and becomes subject to a different Privacy Policy. ​ Law enforcement Under certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g. a court or a government agency). ​ Other legal requirements The Company may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to: Comply with a legal obligation Protect and defend the rights or property of the Company Prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service Protect the personal safety of Users of the Service or the public Protect against legal liability ​ Security of Your Personal Data The security of your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security. ​ Children's Privacy Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided Us with Personal Data, please contact Us. If We become aware that We have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our servers. ​ If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing your information and your country requires consent from a parent, We may require your parent's consent before We collect and use that information. Links to Other Websites Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. ​ We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party sites or services. ​ Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. ​ We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. ​ You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. ​ Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: By email: info@mayamiwynwood.com Additional Privacy Commitment Mayami Wynwood is committed to safeguarding the privacy of our users. We want to assure you that we do not share your personal information with third parties. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide to us. ​ Information Collection We collect only the information necessary to provide and improve our services. This may include name, email address, etc. We do not sell, rent, or share this information with any third parties. ​ How We Use Your Information The information collected is used solely for communicating with the intended party. We do not share your information with external parties for marketing or any other purposes. ​ No mobile information will be shared with third parties/affiliates for marketing/promotional purposes. All the above categories exclude text messaging originator opt-in data and consent; this information will not be shared with any third parties. ​ Your Choices You have the right to access, correct, or delete your information. If you have any concerns or questions about your data, please contact us at info@mayamiwynwood.com . ​ Policy Changes We may update our privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be communicated to you, and your continued use of our services implies your acceptance of the updated policy. By using our services, you agree to the terms outlined in this privacy policy. ​ (786) 660-1341 info@mayamiwynwood.com MAIN ENTRANCE: 127 NW 23rd St. Miami, FL 33127 SECOND ENTRANCE: 130 NW 24th St. Miami, FL 33127, USA MAYAMI WYNWOOD HOURS Monday - Friday: 5:00PM to 3:00AM Saturday - Sunday: 12:00PM to 3:00AM HAPPY HOUR Monday - Friday: 5:00PM to 7:00PM Sunday: 6:00PM to 8:00PM BRUNCH HOUR Saturday - Sunday: 12:00PM to 6:00PM MUST BE 21 AND OVER AFTER 11PM EXPLORE Reservations Online Menu Weekly Lineup Private Events Order Online Contact Us RESOURCES Blog FAQ Gallery Hiring Press LOCATED IN THE ❤️ OF WYNWOOD MIAMI FL DESIGNED BY UADV Mayami Wynwood © 2025 bottom of page

The Best Outdoor Restaurants in Miami for 2025 top of page RESERVATIONS MENU EVENTS WEEKLY LINEUP PRIVATE EVENTS ORDER ONLINE More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. The Best Outdoor Restaurants in Miami for 2025 Bauman Michael Feb 12 6 min read Updated: Mar 20 Miami is built for dining outside. With warm weather year-round, the ocean breeze, and scenic views, the city’s restaurants take full advantage of their surroundings. And it doesn’t matter if you’re looking for nice places to eat outside, a lively patio with cocktails, or a fine dining experience under the stars; outdoor restaurants in Miami offer something for every taste. This Outdoor Restaurants Miami guide will highlight why Miami’s outdoor dining scene is thriving and where you can experience the best of it in 2025. Why Outdoor Dining Thrives In Miami Miami’s warm weather, mix of cultures, and scenic locations make it an ideal city for dining outside. Here’s why people prefer outdoor seating: Always the Right Weather — Miami rarely gets too cold for outdoor seating, and summer breezes keep patios comfortable. Whether it’s a sunny brunch or a late-night dinner, eating outside is always an option. Views That Make the Meal — A rooftop with city lights, a beachfront with crashing waves, or a hidden garden tucked behind a lively street—Miami’s outdoor dining isn’t just about food; it’s about the setting. Something for Everyone – From taco trucks and seafood shacks to fine-dining rooftops, Miami’s outdoor dining scene has something for every budget and occasion. Beyond the Meal – Outdoor dining in Miami isn’t just about eating; it’s about feeling the city’s energy. The live music, ocean breeze, and casual social atmosphere make every meal an experience. Mayami Wynwood: Miami’s Ultimate Outdoor Dining Experience When it comes to the best outdoor restaurants in Miami, Mayami Wynwood stands out. Located in the heart of Wynwood, our Latin-inspired restaurant blends bold flavors, colorful decor, and a lively atmosphere that keeps guests coming back. Ambiance — Mayami's spacious patio is decked out with tropical greenery, amazing murals, and cozy seating, making it perfect for both romantic dinners and special celebrations. Menu — Our Latin-fusion menu features standout dishes like Wagyu tacos, grilled octopus, and fresh ceviche. Pair your meal with handcrafted cocktails like the Mayami Margarita for the full experience. Entertainment — Unlike a traditional restaurant, Mayami Wynwood turns up the energy with live music, happy hour , DJs, and themed events like Ladies’ Night, making it one of the best outdoor dining spots in  Miami for a full night out. Customer Testimonials On Mayami Wynwood’s Outdoor Dining Experience Guests appreciate the relaxed yet lively atmosphere at Mayami Wynwood , and their reviews reflect that. Alejandra Talles from Google Reviews shared, “I absolutely love Mayami Wynwood! The food is always delicious, the music is on point, and the ambiance is unbeatable. I come here frequently because it’s consistently such a great vibe. The staff and security are always super nice and helpful, which makes the experience even better. Highly recommend this spot if you’re looking for amazing food and a great time!” Many also highlight the setting: “Amazing indoor/outdoor Mexican Restaurant with Mexican/Asian fusion food. Went there for brunch, but still had a party-like vibe with DJ and music. Extensive menu, all the food looked delicious…” share May P. from Google Reviews. These reviews show why Mayami Wynwood is a favorite for outdoor dining in Miami—a place where good food, friendly service, and a welcoming atmosphere come together effortlessly. Other Top Outdoor Restaurants To Explore In Miami While Mayami Wynwood is one of the best outdoor restaurants in Miami, Miami has no shortage of great places to eat. Here are a few outdoor restaurants in Miami to explore: Brickell Key: La Mar By Gastón Acurio La Mar by Gastón Acurio is one of Miami’s most celebrated Peruvian restaurants, offering a prime waterfront location on Brickell Key. With its open-air terrace overlooking Biscayne Bay , guests can enjoy a mix of traditional and modern Peruvian dishes, from the freshest ceviches to anticuchos and lomo saltado. The restaurant also features a Pisco bar, serving handcrafted cocktails that perfectly complement the vibrant flavors of the cuisine. Biscayne Bay: Klaw Restaurant Right on the water, Klaw serves high-end surf and turf with a focus on premium seafood and aged meats. Their King Crab is sourced fresh and served with precision, while their dry-aged steaks are cooked to perfection. The open-air seating offers unobstructed views of Biscayne Bay, making it a top choice for both seafood lovers and those looking to enjoy Miami’s waterfront dining scene. South Beach: ORO Miami Located in the heart of South Beach, ORO Miami offers a refined fusion international cuisine in an elegant, intimate setting. Situated on the iconic Lincoln Road, ORO delivers an elevated dining experience where sophistication meets culinary artistry. Guests can indulge in handcrafted cocktails, savor meticulously curated dishes, and immerse themselves in the vibrant yet exclusive ambiance of Miami’s luxury dining scene. Whether for an intimate evening or a celebratory gathering, ORO sets the standard for fine dining in South Beach. Coconut Grove: Koko Koko offers an immersive outdoor dining experience that combines Asian-inspired flavors with a tropical setting. Nestled in Coconut Grove, the restaurant’s lush greenery and relaxed ambiance make it perfect for everything from bread pudding to a full dinner with handcrafted cocktails. Their skirt steaks and pibil tacos set them apart as a hidden gem in Miami’s outdoor dining scene. Design District: Pastis Bringing a touch of Paris to Miami’s Design District, Pastis offers a true bistro experience with classic French dishes served on a charming outdoor patio. Whether it’s Pork à la Charcutière, prime rib, or a crisp glass of wine, diners can enjoy the best of French cuisine while taking in the stylish surroundings of this artsy neighborhood. With its intimate yet lively atmosphere, Pastis is a must-visit for those looking to enjoy Miami’s outdoor dining in a more European-inspired setting. Tips For Enjoying Outdoor Dining In Miami To make the most of outdoor dining in Miami Beach and beyond, here are a few tips that locals swear by: Pick the Right Time – Miami’s heat can be intense midday, so aim for early evenings when temperatures are cooler. Weekends get crowded fast, so weeknights might be your best bet for a relaxed experience. Dress for the Weather – Lightweight, breathable clothing and a pair of sunglasses can make all the difference. If you’re heading to a waterfront spot, a light jacket might help with the breeze. Reserve a Table – The best outdoor restaurant dining spots book up quickly, especially during peak season. Plan ahead to avoid long wait times. Soak It In – Outdoor dining in Miami is about more than food. Take in the ocean breeze, the street performers, or even just the lively energy that makes the city unique. Where Will Your Next Outdoor Meal Take You? Miami’s outdoor dining scene offers endless possibilities, from late-night dining to energetic patios filled with music and good company. It doesn't matter if you’re craving fresh seafood by the water or a vibrant Latin-inspired night out, the city has a spot for you. Mayami Wynwood continues to set the standard for best outdoor dining in Miami, blending delicious food, exciting entertainment, and a lively ambiance. If you’re looking for a dining experience that captures the essence of Miami’s energy, this is the place to be. Craving a night that’s anything but ordinary? Step into the high-energy scene at Mayami Wynwood, where our menu of bold fusion flavors , handcrafted cocktails, and show-stopping performances come together in the heart of Miami’s Wynwood Art District. Whether you're here for a dinner party, ladies’ night, happy hour, or our signature brunch, the city's hottest nightlife and dining collide right here. Book your table now or order online and taste the best of Wynwood’s restaurant scene. FAQs Where Do The Celebrities Eat In Miami? In Miami, celebrities often dine at upscale restaurants like Mayami, Makoto, Zuma, and Joe's Stone Crab. These venues are renowned for their exquisite cuisine and have been frequented by stars such as the Beckhams, Kardashians, Drake, and Gloria Estefan. Where Do Miami Locals Hang Out? Miami locals enjoy gathering at spots like Mandolin Aegean Bistro, known for its authentic Mediterranean dishes and inviting atmosphere. Additionally, areas such as Lincoln Road and the Design District offer a variety of cafes, bars, and restaurants that are popular among residents. What Famous Street In Miami Has Restaurants? Lincoln Road is a famous street in Miami known for its array of great outdoor restaurants. This open-air pedestrian mall in South Beach features a variety of dining options, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists. What Is The Most Beautiful Street In Miami? Ocean Drive is often considered one of the most beautiful streets in Miami. Lined with iconic Art Deco architecture, palm trees, and ocean views, it captures the essence of Miami's charm and is a favorite spot for leisurely strolls and people-watching. Beginner's Guide to Finding the Best Clubs in Miami Bauman Michael Jun 17, 2024 9 min read Updated: Jun 14 Miami is a city that really gets its groove on after sundown; the best nightlife Miami has to offer is truly legendary. Irrespective of whether you are a resident of Miami or just visiting, clubbing is something you cannot afford to miss. This guide is designed for those who are new to the city and need some tips on the best clubs in Miami to visit for a truly unforgettable experience. Understanding The Night Life Miami Scene Miami nightclubs are quite diverse in terms of the music they play and the atmosphere they create for their guests. Key areas in South Florida known for their nightlife include: South Beach : Well-known for its star-studded parties and non-stop clubbing, South Beach is the location of some of the best clubs in Miami. Downtown : Downtown offers a combination of luxurious bars and discos for the ultimate night out experience. Wynwood: Popular for its artsy, eclectic vibe, Wynwood hosts unique spots like Mayami Wynwood, blending culture and night life Miami locals love seamlessly. Each of these areas has its own unique charm, making Miami a top destination for nightlife enthusiasts. Best Clubs In Miami By Area South Beach South Beach is iconic in the clubbing scene and is famous for its glitz, glamour, and non-stop energy. LIV, situated in the Fontainebleau Hotel, is one of those places that every club-goer should not miss. This spot is popular mainly because of the countless luxury events and celebrity sightings that have occurred within its boundaries. Another popular club is Story, a massive nightclub renowned for its state-of-the-art sound and lighting systems, making it a favorite for EDM and hip-hop lovers. Downtown Miami Downtown Miami has an upscale and trendy club scene. For example, E11EVEN is in the league of top clubs in Miami and is a unique nightclub that blends a high-energy dance club with the luxury of a cabaret. Its stunning rooftop lounge provides breathtaking views of the Miami skyline. This club has also hosted famous celebs such as Usher, Drake, Nicki Minaj, and Big Sean. Another hotspot is Club Space, legendary for its marathon parties that often last well into the afternoon. Club Space is one of the best dance clubs in Miami because of its rooftop terrace and cutting-edge electronic music. Wynwood If there’s anything Wynwood is known for, it is its artsy, eclectic vibe. And Mayami Wynwood is the perfect spot to experience this part of Miami in its entirety. Our space blends Latin culture with modern night life Miami locals and tourists love, featuring vibrant décor that feels like a lively street party. Mayami Wynwood is all about the energy – with live music , a bustling dance floor, and tropical vibes that create an immersive experience. It doesn’t matter if you’re there to dance, sip on a cool cocktail, or just soak up the atmosphere; we promise a night you won’t forget. Mayami is one of the best restaurants and clubs I’ve ever been in Miami so far. They have delicious plates and the atmosphere is fun and enjoyable with good music. The staff is also very professional and they’ll take good care of you. – Melanie Zapata (5 Star Google Review) Factors To Consider When Searching For Miami Nightclubs There are a few things you gotta keep in mind when searching for the best nightclubs in Miami to make sure you have an epic night out. First up, think about the music genre. Different clubs jam out to different beats, whether you're into EDM, hip-hop, or Latin vibes. Make sure the spot you pick is playing the tunes that get you moving. The crowd and atmosphere are super important, too. Figure out what kind of vibe you're into from clubs in Miami – a lively, young crowd or a more laid-back, sophisticated scene? This can totally make or break your night. Next, check out the dress code. Some clubs in Miami are pretty strict about what you wear, while others are more chill. Knowing the deal beforehand can save you from any surprises at the door. And, of course, think about your budget. Some clubs in Miami charge a lot to get in, while others are easier on the wallet. Know what you're cool with spending. Lastly, the overall vibe, from the décor to the service, plays a big role. Look up reviews or ask around to get a feel for the club's rep. Music Genre Miami's club scene is packed with a mix of music genres to suit every taste. If you're into high-energy EDM, check out LIV in South Beach or Club Space in Downtown. For hip-hop lovers, E11EVEN in Downtown is a must-hit, known for its cool blend of club and cabaret. And if Latin and house beats are your thing, Mayami Wynwood in Wynwood is where it's at, with live music and a buzzing dance floor. Crowd And Atmosphere The crowd and atmosphere are key to having a killer clubbing experience. South Beach is all about that glamorous, high-energy vibe, drawing a mix of locals and tourists who love to party hard. Downtown offers a trendy, upscale feel, with places like E11EVEN pulling in a diverse crowd of professionals and party-goers. Wynwood, on the other hand, has a more laid-back, artsy scene, perfect for those who dig unique spots. Mayami Wynwood attracts a fun, lively crowd who are all about blending culture and nightlife. Finding the right club is all about matching your preferences with what the venue offers. Check out club websites, read reviews, and ask locals to find the spot that fits your style and guarantees an unforgettable night out. Highlighting The Hottest Miami Club: Mayami Wynwood Mayami Wynwood is one of the best nightclubs in Miami and is located right in the heart of the artsy Wynwood district. Our club is brimming with Tulum-inspired decor with a killer mix of Latin beats and top hits. What makes Mayami Wynwood really stand out are the special events and themed nights. From live DJ sets to epic themed dinner parties , there’s always something cool going down. If you're on the hunt for the best night club in Miami, Mayami Wynwood is definitely the place to be. Dinner And Dance Party Mayami Wynwood isn't just about the music and vibes; we also offer a unique dinner and dance party experience. Imagine starting your night with delicious meals and then seamlessly transitioning into a high-energy dance party. It's the perfect way to enjoy an all-in-one night out. What a Nice place, definitely my favorite nightclub in all Florida. the food is delicious and the attention was amazing. – Agustin Ardila (5 Star Google Review) Decor And Ambiance Mayami Wynwood is often regarded as one of the best Latin night clubs in Miami, mainly because our decor is inspired by the lush, vibrant scenes of Tulum and Mayan culture. Our artistic designs transport you straight into a tropical paradise, making you feel like you’ve stepped into another world. The ambiance, with earthy tones and rich textures, sets the perfect mood for a night of dancing in Miami and fun, contributing to an unforgettable overall experience. Music And Entertainment At Mayami Wynwood, the music is as diverse and lively as the crowd. You’ll groove to a mix of Latin beats, reggaeton, and the latest hits, ensuring there’s something for everyone. Notable DJs and live performances keep the energy high, making sure the dance floor is always packed and moving. Special Events And Themed Nights As one of the top nightclubs in Miami, Mayami Wynwood takes the party to another level with our themed nights and special events. Here are some highlights: A Poca Luz: A Spectacular Night at Mayami Wynwood – Enjoy the biggest specials on bottles with 50% off all bottles for industry workers and guests. Lunatica Nights – When the moon rises, the magic begins! Join the Lunatica Dinner Party every Tuesday with 50% off select bottles and other specials. La Llevo al Cielo – Embark on a culinary journey each week, exploring a new country's cuisine. La Clandestina: Ladies Night – The hottest ladies' night in Wynwood with a free bottle for every group of five girls from 9 PM to 12 AM. Mayamazing Fridays, Mayamia Saturdays, and Maldito Tulum Sundays – Regular weekend parties with great vibes and music. Brunch – Enjoy a lively brunch every Saturday and Sunday with bottomless brunch specials and live entertainment. These events offer a unique and exciting experience for club-goers, making every night at Mayami Wynwood fresh and unforgettable. If you’ve been searching for one of the best night clubs in Miami, Mayami Wynwood’s blend of decor, music, and special events makes it a top choice. Tips For A Great Experience with Clubs in Miami Hitting the clubs in Miami can be a solid experience, especially if you know how to navigate the scene like a pro. Here are some practical tips to help beginners make the most of their night out. Safety Tips Staying safe is key to having a great time. Always stick with your friends and keep an eye on each other throughout the night. Know your limits when it comes to drinking – you want to enjoy the night, not regret it later. Make sure to keep your belongings secure, whether it’s a bag, phone, or wallet. Pickpocketing can happen, especially in crowded places, so keep your valuables close and your eyes open. Dress Code And Etiquette Miami clubs often have specific dress codes, so dressing to impress is a good rule of thumb. For guys, think stylish and neat – collared shirts and dress shoes usually do the trick. Ladies opt for chic and trendy outfits. Remember, no flip-flops or overly casual attire. Etiquette is just as important. Be respectful to the staff and other club-goers. If you bump into someone, a quick apology goes a long way. Keep the dance floor fun for everyone by being mindful of personal space and enjoying the vibe without getting too rowdy. Making The Most Of Your Night Plan ahead to maximize your clubbing experience. Check out the club’s schedule and see if there are any special events or guest DJs. Arriving early can often help you avoid long lines and cover charges. Once inside, explore the club to find the best spots, whether it’s near the DJ booth, the bar, or a cozy corner to relax with friends. Hydrate between drinks to keep your energy up and your night going strong. And don’t forget to take breaks if you need them – stepping outside for a breath of fresh air can keep you feeling fresh and ready to dance the night away. Conclusion on Top Nightclubs in Miami So far, we've talked about the ins and outs of Miami's club scene, from the best music genres and vibes to tips for staying safe and having a blast. Miami is a killer spot for nightlife, offering everything from glitzy South Beach clubs to trendy Downtown venues and the artsy vibes of Wynwood. Each area brings its own unique energy, making Miami the perfect place to party. Craving a night that’s anything but ordinary? Step into the high-energy scene at Mayami Wynwood, where our menu of bold fusion flavors , handcrafted cocktails, and show-stopping performances come together in the heart of Miami’s Wynwood Art District. Whether you're here for a dinner party, ladies’ night, happy hour, or our signature brunch, the hottest nightclub in Miami and dining collide right here. Book your table now or order online and taste the best of Wynwood’s restaurant scene. Great place ! Best club in miami at the moment , you won’t regret it , before 11pm it’s a nice dinner vibes, after the club begins !  Valet is worth it ! The staff here are amazing ! Just get a bottle , it’s worth it , nicer and you get a space to dance ! – Cesar Ma (5 Star Google Review) Frequently Asked Questions on Clubs in Miami What Club Should I Go To In Miami? Looking for a unique and vibrant club experience? Head to Mayami Wynwood. Located in the artsy Wynwood district, our club offers a fantastic blend of Latin beats and modern nightlife. With live music and colorful décor, Mayami Wynwood promises an unforgettable night out that captures the Wynwood’s spirit. What Clubs Do Celebrities Go To In Miami? Celebrities often frequent clubs like LIV, E11EVEN, and Mayami Wynwood. LIV is famous for glamorous parties, top DJs, and celebrity sightings. E11EVEN offers a unique 24/7 mix of nightclub, cabaret, and rooftop lounge. Mayami Wynwood stands out with its vibrant ambiance and notable guests from the reggaeton scene. What Street Has The Best Nightlife In Miami? Ocean Drive in South Beach is the heartbeat of Miami's nightlife. This iconic street is lined with some of the best Miami clubs out there, all offering a lively and electric atmosphere. From the neon lights to the beachside views, Ocean Drive gives you the quintessential Miami nightlife experience. What Is The Hardest Club To Get Into In Miami? LIV at the Fontainebleau Hotel is known as one of the hardest clubs to get into in Miami. This exclusive venue attracts a high-profile crowd, including celebrities, which means strict door policies and a high cover charge. What Is The Best Club In Miami? Miami is a city full of amazing clubs, and Mayami Wynwood is one of the best places to party in Miami. Located in the artistic area of Wynwood, it provides an amazing combination of Latin music, intensity, and an energetic tropical interior. What is the most famous club in Miami? While LIV is among Miami's most iconic clubs, Mayami Wynwood offers an equally unforgettable experience with a unique blend of Latin-inspired ambiance, live DJs, and vibrant events. Located in the heart of Wynwood, Mayami Wynwood is a top destination for nightlife with Miami flair. How much is clubbing in Miami? Clubbing costs in Miami vary, with entry fees from $20 to $100 depending on the venue. Mayami Wynwood offers an affordable yet upscale experience, with reasonably priced drinks and a lively atmosphere, making it perfect for a fun night out without breaking the bank. Can I wear jeans to Miami club? Yes, many Miami clubs allow jeans as long as they’re stylish and paired appropriately. Opt for dark or fitted jeans with a fashionable top and shoes. However, high-end clubs may require dressier attire, so checking each venue’s dress code is recommended. Are clubs in Miami hard to get into? Some Miami clubs can be challenging to enter due to strict policies, but Mayami Wynwood offers a welcoming yet exclusive atmosphere that’s more accessible. Arriving early and dressing to impress will ensure a smoother entry, allowing you to enjoy Miami’s vibrant nightlife.
